title: Increase adm rates causes financial capital inflow

content.question: Which of the following is likely to result in an inflow of financial capital to Country R?

choices.label: A decrease in Country R’s government budget deficit
An increase in personal income tax rates in Country R
An increase in administered interest rates by the central bank of Country R
An increase in Country R’s trade surplus
Increased political instability in Country R

content.answer: An increase in administered interest rates by the central bank of Country R

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows
